nodes.text: Moof Juice was fruity, slightly spicy, orange-colored non-alcoholic beverage which was served at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo in Black Spire Outpost on the Outer Rim planet Batuu. Sometime during the war between the First Order and the Resistance, Docking Bay 7 was rented out by Strono Tuggs to set up his mobile eatery Tuggs' Grub, from which he served the beverage. It was suitable for human consumption. Although moof juice shared its name with the moof species, it was not to be confused with moof milk.

Moof Juice made its first appearance as one of the non-alcoholic beverages sold to guests at the Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo quick-service restaurant in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened in Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019. It was first revealed as part of a large promotional event held on February 26, 2019. The menu's description reads, "Simply Fruit Punch®, Simply Orange® with Pineapple, Chipotle-Pineapple."
